title: India's First EDU-LLM
narration: Imagine a future where every Indian classroom has access to a personalized AI teacher. This is the vision behind India's first EDULLM a project designed to revolutionize education across the nation.

title: AI for Indian Classrooms
content:
AI teacher tailored for Indian classrooms.
Personalized learning experiences.
Accessible education for all.
image_desc: Bright Indian classroom — students learning with tablets, teacher smiling. Type: classroom image
narration: This AI teacher is specifically designed to understand the unique needs and challenges of Indian classrooms. It aims to provide personalized learning experiences making education more accessible and effective for every student regardless of their background.

title: Multilingual and Adaptive
content:
Built in every language.
Powered by your lessons and quizzes.
Adapts dynamically to student needs.
image_desc: Split-screen showing: A teacher uploading a lesson, A quiz in Hindi, A student speaking in Tamil, The EDU-LLM interface adapting dynamically. Type: software interface
narration: The EDULLM is built to support every language spoken in India ensuring that no student is left behind. It's powered by the lessons quizzes and ideas contributed by educators and it adapts dynamically to meet the individual needs of each student.

title: Join the Movement
content:
Help Build India's First EDU-LLM
Contribute Now
image_desc: Bold text: "Help Build India's First EDU-LLM" with CTA button: Contribute Now. Type: call to action
narration: Be a part of shaping the future of education in India. Join the movement to build India's first EDULLM and help create a brighter future for generations to come. Contribute your expertise and resources to make this vision a reality.
